name: Ondes Controller VR
description:
Hi! I present to you my Ondes Controller.

It is Quest 2 standalone version, not tested on Quest1 or Pro. 

PCVR and MIDi controller version are in dev and should be out soon

This is a Work in Progress. It intends to recreate the ribbon function of the Ondes Martenot.

It supports Handtracking.

# What's next ?

- Improve visuals

 - Add new environments

- Adding a player to be able to play along your favorite mp3s

- ...

# Additional infos :

Send me link to your videos, I'd love to see what you can manage to do!

# Other links :

- PCVR version : soon

- PCVR MIDI Controller : soon
